```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.linalg import fiedler_companion, eigvals
>>> p = np.poly(np.arange(1, 9, 2))  # [1., -16., 86., -176., 105.]
>>> fc = fiedler_companion(p)
>>> fc
array([[  16.,  -86.,    1.,    0.],
 [   1.,    0.,    0.,    0.],
 [   0.,  176.,    0., -105.],
 [   0.,    1.,    0.,    0.]])
>>> eigvals(fc)
array([7.+0.j, 5.+0.j, 3.+0.j, 1.+0.j]) 
```
